Concepts: Concepts related to this question. (Comma separated if more than one)
Title: Title for the assessment item
Question: Question Body
Question Image: Image used in the question body (if any)
Question Audio: Audio asset used in the question body (if any)
Image Count: For numeracy questions, repeat the body image how many times?
Language: Language for the item (Hindi, English, Kannada, Telugu)
Difficulty Level:
How difficult is the question? 
(EASY, MEDIUM, DIFFICULT, RARE)
LHS Option 1 Text:
LHS Options
Text - Text of the option
Image - Image to use in option
RHS Option 1 Text:
RHS Options
Text - Text of the option
Image - Image to use in option
Answer - index of the LHS option to map to
Template Name: Name of the template to use with this question
Template ID: ID of the template to use with this question
